physical_examinations.vital_signs: Body weight: 20 kg (25th-50th percentile), Height: 110 cm (10th-25th percentile)
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Physical examination revealed numerous crusts, erosions, and excoriations on face, arms, and legs; prominent perioral fissuring and cheilitis; sparse, dry, and wiry scalp hair; marked loss of eyelashes and eyebrows; trauma-induced blisters and erosions; thickening and yellowish discoloration of finger and toenails; focal hyperkeratosis and fissures on palms and soles; normal oral mucosa except loss of papillae on tongue.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Condition worsened during summer; minor trauma resulted in skin peeling; developed small blisters after sun exposure.
